channel.title: How do you change where the safezones are on your server?
channel.description: I have Hiyascape and I want to change some of the safezones. How would I do that?

item.title: How do you change where the safezones are on your server?
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

I had this problem too. Control + f Nonwild() and it’l take you to the non wildy options. It’s a little difficult, but put X1 and Y1 as the starting corner…and X2 and Y2 as the other corner. it’s like a box

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change where the safezones are on your server?
